title: Clean Architecture
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Essential guide to building maintainable software systems. Covers SOLID principles, component design, and architectural boundaries.

title: Building Microservices
author: Sam Newman
description: Comprehensive guide to designing, building, and deploying microservices. Covers service boundaries, deployment, and organizational challenges.

title: The DevOps Handbook
author: Gene Kim, Jez Humble, Patrick Debois, John Willis
description: Practical guide to implementing DevOps practices. Essential for platform engineers building CI/CD pipelines and automation.

title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
author: Martin Kleppmann
description: Deep dive into distributed systems, databases, and data processing. Critical for understanding modern cloud architectures.

title: Site Reliability Engineering
author: Google
description: Google's approach to building and running large-scale systems. Covers monitoring, incident response, and reliability practices.

title: Terraform: Up & Running
author: Yevgeniy Brikman
description: Practical guide to infrastructure as code with Terraform. Essential for cloud platform engineering.

title: Staff Engineer: Leadership beyond the management track
author: Will Larson
description: Guide to thriving as a staff+ engineer. Covers technical leadership, influence, and career growth.

title: Effective Java
author: Joshua Bloch
description: Best practices for Java development. Essential reading for any serious Java developer.
